name: 31-graphql-federation-code-first
description: A simple example of GraphQL Federation using Code First approach.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n front,back -c green,yellow,red -t "HH:mm:ss" -p "{name} {time}" "npm --prefix ./movie-application run start:dev" "npm --prefix ./users-application run start:dev"  "npm --prefix ./gateway run start:dev"
scripts.setup: npm i && npm --prefix ./movie-application i && npm --prefix  ./users-application i && npm --prefix  ./gateway i
